clients.deleteClient: Do you want to delete this client?
clients.name: Name

permissions.deleteRoleWithUsers: This Occupation is currently assigned to ({{userCount}}) employees. Are you sure you want to delete it?
permissions.infoContent:
Booking Permission: Requires at least read and view permissions for each of the following: (Payments - Clients - Services - Events - Payment Methods).
Purchase Permission: Requires at least read and view permissions for expense items and suppliers.
Payments Permission: Requires at least read and view permissions for payment methods.
permissions.dependencyWarning: This permission cannot be disabled because other permissions depend on it, such as (delete, add, edit ...)

employees.wantToDeleteEmployee: Are you sure you want to delete this employee
employees.generalPermissionDesc: Grants the employee complete control over all records without restrictions.
employees.specialPermissionDesc: Allows the employee to manage only the records they created, without the ability to modify or delete records created by others.

halls.emptyHallState: You don't have halls yet , please add one

halls.secondaryColorHint: select secondary color by choosing one of the following colors
halls.specialDayTitlePlaceholder: Enter the title of the special day
halls.daysError: Please fill in the price for all the weekdays

pricingTypeDescriptions.bookingTime: Through this selection, the reservation coordinator determines the price with the customer while creating the reservation.
pricingTypeDescriptions.fixedAdmin: Through this selection, a fixed price is predetermined based on the day and type of period.
pricingTypeDescriptions.eventPrice: Through this selection, an event price is predetermined based on the day and type of period.

pricingCalculationDescriptions.fixedPrice: A fixed price for the hall regardless of the number of individuals.

halls.selectSecondaryColorHint: Click on any color below to set it as secondary
halls.noColorsExtracted: No colors could be extracted from this image
halls.logoInstruction1: Upload a logo to represent your hall
halls.logoInstruction3: File formats: JPG, PNG, SVG (transparent background preferred)
halls.teamDescription: The daily schedule is a service that allows specifying the team to whom the daily schedule will be sent, showing the day's bookings and their details without price details and terms and conditions.
halls.selectEmployeePlaceholder: Select an employee from the list
halls.sendingTimeInfo: The sending time is when email notifications are sent to team members
halls.dateRangeError: The start date should be before the end date
halls.scheduleMaxDaysError: Cannot select more than 7 days. Please select a shorter range.
halls.scheduleUpdateError: Failed to update schedule configuration. Please try again.
halls.autoCancelDaysHint: Temporary bookings will be automatically cancelled after this many days from creation date. System will send email notification to clients when bookings are auto-cancelled.

halls.confirmAddNewHall: Please note that adding extra hall requires an additional fee of 100 SAR per month, which will be deducted upon subscription renewal. Would you like to proceed?
halls.brandColorsDescription: Brand colors are the primary colors that represent your hall website. You must first choose the logo image to analyze its primary and secondary colors in order to customize the hall website’s appearance.

aiChat.subtitle: Ask questions about your data and get instant visualizations

aiChat.placeholder: Ask me anything about your data...

prompts.title: Try asking me:
examples: Show me booking trends for the last 3 months
What's the revenue by hall type?
Compare this month's performance to last month
